name: Serp Tool
author: Rakesh Raushan

sections.description:
Tested up to: 4.0
You can see how google see your meta tags, meta descriptions. How google see your website.

You can call this in any post or pages with help of shortcode.

Shortcode for access this plugin is: [serp-tool]
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload serp.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [serp-tool] in your pages
sections.faq:
For any queries please contat me at “hello@rakeshraushan.info”

Thank you
